item.title: [Delta] Shop help [Delta] REP++ if helped
item.dc:creator: @jmk600 jmk600
item.description:
@jmk600 wrote:

case 250: if(c.playerHasItem(3706, 150000000) || c.playerHasItem(3706, 35000) || c.playerHasItem(3706, 3250000)); c.deleteItem(3706, 150000000); c.addItem(35, 1); c.deleteItem(3706, 35000); c.addItem(6570, 1); c.deleteItem(3706, 3250000); c.addItem(4151, 1); break;

Still doesn’t work? or is that messed up?

should it be:

case 250: if(c.playerHasItem(3706, 150000000) || c.playerHasItem(3706, 35000) || c.playerHasItem(3706, 3250000)); c.deleteItem(3706, 150000000); c.deleteItem(3706, 35000); c.deleteItem(3706, 3250000); c.addItem(35, 1); c.addItem(6570, 1); c.addItem(4151, 1); break;
?

item.title: [Delta] Shop help [Delta] REP++ if helped
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

well i dont know if you want to do it this way but i used this code when i was making a shop like that

case 229:
ifplayerhasitem(itemid,ammount)
deleteitem(itemid,ammount)
additem(itemid ammount)
break;

i know thats not the actual code i just typed that up quickly

all thats saying is the npc replaces the tokens you have with the item you want

item.title: [Delta] Shop help [Delta] REP++ if helped
item.dc:creator: @jmk600 jmk600
item.description:
@jmk600 wrote:

Why does everybody keep ignoring my questions? I think somebody. Atleast ONE person. Can help me…

How do I change my shop problem. I want my shop to take tokens instead of coins.

Here is my shop code:

if (Slot7 == -1 && MyShopID == 27) { sM("You don't have enough Overkill Tokens."); break; }

if (MyShopID == 27) { if (playerItemsN[Slot7] >= TotPrice2) { if (freeSlots() > 0) { deleteItem(3706, GetItemSlot(3706), TotPrice2); addItem(itemID, 1); server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1; server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) { server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { sM("Not enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { sM("Not enough Overkill tokens for this item."); } }

Also, whenever I buy something, it buys 2 of whatever I try to buy

Please somebody help me…

Read full topic
